## Submission Checklist

**Case Content:**
- [ ] Complete case JSON file
- [ ] All suspects have detailed profiles
- [ ] All evidence items described
- [ ] Red herrings included
- [ ] Solution is logical and satisfying
- [ ] Tested by at least 2 people

**Technical Requirements:**
- [ ] Follows case schema (docs/CASE_SCHEMA.md)
- [ ] JSON validates correctly
- [ ] All IDs are unique
- [ ] Spatial anchor data included (if applicable)
- [ ] No copyrighted content

**Legal & Content:**
- [ ] Original content or properly licensed
- [ ] No inappropriate content
- [ ] No real unsolved crimes used
- [ ] Cultural sensitivity considered
- [ ] Age-appropriate
